## shouldUseDOMEnvironment variable

Checks which environment should be used. Returns true when we are in the dom environment.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
shouldUseDOMEnvironment: (forceEnvironment?: "ssr" | "dom" | undefined) => boolean
```
